===Origin===
[[File:Y-Men_(Earth-616)_from_Young_X-Men_Vol_1_8.jpg|left|250px|thumb]]
The '''Y-Men''' were a gang of criminals operating out of the closed La Jolla Paintball Arena in [[California (State)|California]]. When mutant tattoo artist [[Leon Nunez (Earth-616)|Leon Nunez]] came into debt to them for $18,000, he offered to give them superpowers to pay it off.{{r|Young X-Men #10}} Many of the Y-Men's abilities are based on superheroes. 

Despite posing a large challenge, they were defeated by the [[Young X-Men (Earth-616)|Young X-Men]] and depowered by [[Eric Gitter (Earth-616)|Ink]]'s new [[Phoenix Force (Earth-616)|Phoenix force-like power]].{{r|Young X-Men #10}}

[[File:Y-Men (Earth-616) from Young X-Men Vol 1 8 0001.jpg|thumb|350px|right|Some of the Y-Men at the La Jolla Paintball Arena]]

===Members/Powers===
*[[Carlos Rodriguez (Earth-616)|Carlos Rodriguez]] - Bomb tattoo on left hand allowed for explosive punches and shield tattoo on his right forearm created a protective shield.{{r|Young X-Men 8|9}}
*[[Julio Rodriguez (Earth-616)|Julio Rodriguez]]- Discharge marks around his left eye allowed him to blast a golden optic beam. He was fairly overweight.{{r|Young X-Men 8}}
*''"[[Cheetah (Y-Men) (Earth-616)|Cheetah]]"'' - Cheetah-style spots over his torso granted him superhuman speed and razor sharp claws.{{r|Young X-Men 8}}
*''"[[Spider-Man (Y-Men) (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]]"'' - Webbing patterns on his elbows granted him [[Spider-Man (Peter Parker)|Spider-Man-esque]] agility.
*''"[[Hand-Gun (Earth-616)|Hand-Gun]]"'' - Tattoo of a 9mm on his right hand let him shoot actual bullets from his pointer and index fingers.{{r|Young X-Men 9}}
*''"[[Dragon-Breath (Earth-616)|Dragon-Breath]]"'' - Dragon tattoos on his chest and arms allowed him to breath fire.{{r|Young X-Men 9}}
*''"[[Laser-Fist (Earth-616)|Laser-Fist]]"'' - Triangles on his forearms and wrists branched into lines to each finger which let him blast golden energy beam from his palms. He wore a large Mohawk.{{r|Young X-Men 8}}
